text: Barbara Kay Olson (n√©e Bracher; December 27, 1955 September 11, 2001) was an American lawyer and conservative television commentator. She was born in Houston, Texas. She worked for CNN, Fox News Channel, and several other outlets.Lewis, Neil A. (September 13, 2001). "Barbara Olson, 45, Advocate And Conservative Commentator". The New York Times. She was married to Solicitor General Theodore Olson. Olson was a passenger on American Airlines Flight 77 route to California when it was flown into The Pentagon in the September 11 attacks. Her original plan had been to fly to California on September 10, but she delayed her departure until the next morning so that she could wake up with her husband on his birthday, September 11. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:2001 deaths Category:Victims of the September 11 attacks Category:Lawyers from Houston Category:American political commentators Category:Writers from Houston
title: Barbara Olson
